description: "Captain America: Civil War" has started filming in Atlanta.
title: Photos from the "Captain America: Civil War" set in Atlanta
title_page: Photos from the "Captain America: Civil War" set in Atlanta
text:
"Captain America: Civil War" has started filming in Atlanta. Today the project has set up shop at Fado in the Buckhead Atlanta shopping district.
Today's scene involves Paul Rudd and Jeremy Renner and Emily VanCamp I'm told, and I also have some assorted intel for you on Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr. and Chris Evans. Sit tight.
civil-war
The scene happening today appears to be set in London, judging from the double-decker bus and cars parked on the wrong side of the road.
DSCN0138
DSCN0142
DSCN0146
The movie also will film downtown, in the area known as "The Gulch," in addition to Norcross. And of course it's headquartered at the Pinewood Studios facility in Fayette County, an ever-growing campus that hosted "Ant-Man" last year.
More later!
